title: Can people stop over pressuring the junglers?

replies.body: You realize the reason they're so stressed is because of how powerful the role is? Most people have already found that the team with the better jungler wins 70+% of the time. The jungler is worth any other two positions because they are the playmaker early game and early game is everything.

^ this isn't true at all. Every position is valuable, and there are many ways to counter a jungler and punish them for camping. When I get ganked I don't feel it was because the jungler is too much i feel i made a mistake and often enough ganks don't only come from the jungler it comes from anywhere. If anything a gank from the top laner is sometimes the scariest from a backline TP.

Exactly. Players pressure their jungler more than ever, because junglers are more relevant than ever - and they were the most important role since freaking season 2 or 3.

Junglers still gain XP way too fast. If a jungler comes to gank toplane on lvl 3, minions dying in process will usually lift them to level 4 - BEFORE both toplaners. This is riddicoulus.
